author: Polly Findlay
programme: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
method: Place all the ingredients except the oil in a large bowl and mix well with clean hands.  Shape the mixture into about eight sausages. Heat the oil in a wide pan and gently fry the sausages for 6-8 minutes or until cooked through.
ingredients: 450g/1lb lamb mince,  450g/1lb pork mince,  1Â½ tbsp honey,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  30g/1oz breadcrumbs,  3 tbsp chopped fresh mint,  1 free-range egg,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper,  oil, for frying
